boardgame.name: Kardinaal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Koning
Kardinal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; König
Web of Power
王と枢機卿
boardgame.description: Players struggle for influence over regions of Europe by placing two different type of control markers, Monasteries and Advisors. Monasteries are the basic placement, with the goal of securing a majority in a region or chain of monasteries or even decent points from second place. The placement of the Advisors is more restricted as the total number of Advisors in a region is limited by the majority player's number of monasteries. The game is played in two rounds and is very fast paced._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Online Play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;a target='_blank' href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;http://www.boardgames-online.net_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;http://www.boardgames-online.net_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; (turn-based)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Implemented bonus maps: China, Hellenia, Skandinavia, America, AD 850, Life on Mars, Big in Japan, Soviet Union_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;a target='_blank' href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;http://www.onlinebrettspiele.de/kuk/default.asp?l=en_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;http://www.onlinebrettspiele.de/kuk/default.asp?l=en_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; (Against AI)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; China_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Iwari_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Web of Power: The Vatican_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Web of Power: The Duel_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Web of Power- Rio Grande version complete played but in good condition

English copy (Web of Power), opened but unplayed, with the Vatican “expansion” (really just a nicely printed piece of paper which I mounted on heavy card). The condition is excellent — There’s a very little bit of shelf wear on two of the corners of the box, but all the components are present and flawless. The Vatican expansion, though, is only in good to very good condition — I spattered some glue on it when mounting it on the cardboard, and one of the edges has a slightly rough cut.

WoP plus goodies. This includes the RGG version of Web of Power; it was played several times, but the box and contents are still in very good condition. Also included are the Vatican and Das Duell expansions in mint condition, as well as Kardinal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Konig: Das Kartenspiel which was played several times also, but still basically like new. shipping cost depends on method and destination (send me a message to get a quote), and please add 3% if paying by paypal with a credit card.

BRANDNEW: I´m offering the ultra-rare original German edition. Mint condition (still in shrink-wrap!) All games come from a private collection (non-smoking environment)! Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays actual postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: (1) Cash in a registered letter (only Euro accepted) or (2) Chargefree EU Bank-Transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT) or (3) Moneybookers.com (it´s as fast and safe as PayPal but much cheaper: maximum fee is 0.50 EUR) or (4) PayPal (for PayPal payment please add +5 % of the total sum). Have fun playing, Flix! --------------------------------------------- NEW SHIPPING CONDITIONS TO US!
